name: dna2abc
short_description: dna2abc turns DNA sequences into musical sequences. The key feature is the rule editor; a rule is a regular expression paired with a Tcl script. dna2abc scans a DNA sequence, testing each regular expression: if it matches, the Tcl script is run.
